message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split in my favor, considering I need to move quickly due to inflation affecting my gains.
Given the inflation affecting your gains more than mine, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor this round. It's a fair adjustment considering the circumstances.

Due to the 40% inflation penalty I'm now facing, I need a larger share to get fair value. This 75-25 split will give me effectively $45 in value while you get $25 - similar to a fair split of the original value.

Considering the significant impact of inflation on your share, I'm proposing a 65-35 split in my favor. This offer takes into account the diminishing value of money for you, yet still provides you with a reasonable portion given the circumstances.
